%1$s."1 "Event type:" "Nuisance:" "Difficulty:" "Picturesque:" "Cleanliness:" "km" We use location data to handle better navigation on the Path's map. this permission is not required. Map Path List
We utilise location data to better portray path's events in relation to location information.
your location is never sent anywhere and we don't saved any location information in our aplication/servers. Request permission Paths Checklist Download Paths data! Don't forget a thing
 on your next Adventure!!! List item Note Title Checklist Item Check all items Uncheck all items
About About this App! This application aims to recreate kajak.org.pl functionality that contained several river path descriptions throughout Poland.
all data was provided by original owner.

OpenSource for the win!!!
if you want to contribute go to github.com/czerwix/KajakOrg or contact me via email provided below

if you want to update paths or edit any mistakes please contact me via email below or github/linkedin. I have no clue what ZWA,ZWB...,WWII or U1,U2...,U6 and *,**,*** mean! Learn more here Application created by:
Szymon Kraus
email: czerwiiii@gmail.com All Photos created by:
Bartek Szaro All path data is direct copy of www.kajak.org.pl
